member.name: T:SkylanderPortalMaster.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:SkylanderPortalMaster.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:SkylanderPortalMaster.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:SkylanderPortalMaster.DeviceManagement
member.summary: For detecting devices and receiving device notifications.

member.name: M:SkylanderPortalMaster.DeviceManagement.DeviceNameMatch(System.Windows.Forms.Message,System.String)
member.summary: Compares two device path names. Used to find out if the device name of a recently attached or removed device matches the name of a device the application is communicating with.
member.param: a WM_DEVICECHANGE message. A call to RegisterDeviceNotification causes WM_DEVICECHANGE messages to be passed to an OnDeviceChange routine..
a device pathname returned by SetupDiGetDeviceInterfaceDetail in an SP_DEVICE_INTERFACE_DETAIL_DATA structure.
member.returns: True if the names match, False if not.

member.name: M:SkylanderPortalMaster.DeviceManagement.FindDeviceFromGuid(System.Guid,System.String[]@)
member.summary: Use SetupDi API functions to retrieve the device path name of an attached device that belongs to a device interface class.
member.param: a pointer to the device path name of an attached device.
member.returns: True if a device is found, False if not.

member.name: M:SkylanderPortalMaster.DeviceManagement.RegisterForDeviceNotifications(System.String,System.IntPtr,System.Guid,System.IntPtr@)
member.summary: Requests to receive a notification when a device is attached or removed.
member.param: handle to the window that will receive device events.

member.name: M:SkylanderPortalMaster.DeviceManagement.StopReceivingDeviceNotifications(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Requests to stop receiving notification messages when a device in an interface class is attached or removed.

member.name: F:SkylanderPortalMaster.DeviceManagement.DBT_DEVICEARRIVAL
member.remarks: API declarations relating to device management (SetupDixxx and RegisterDeviceNotification functions). Constants are from dbt.h and setupapi.h.

member.name: T:SkylanderPortalMaster.FileIO
member.summary: API declarations relating to file I/O.
